name: Regrets
description:
You find yourself locked in your childhood bedroom—as an adult—and the key to freedom is letting go of your regrets. A short point and click adventure game demonstrating the Arcweave plugin for the Godot game engine.

Game controls:

  • Interact with location items/characters: left click.
  • Choose inventory item: left click.
  • Examine inventory item: right click.
  • Pause / Settings Menu: ESC or M or P keys. 
  • Skip dialogue line: SPACE or ENTER.

Settings Menu controls:

  • music volume
  • SFX volume
  • dialogue speed
  • player walking speed.

(Settings not saved in Brave Browser—must disable Brave Shields or something)

Written in Arcweave and developed in Godot. You can download the game as a Godot project from its github repo. We have written a short series of articles on how this game was developed, which you can start reading here.
